meetings.name: Daily Standup (Orchestrator)
meetings.goal: Align execution, produce daily plan, dispatch agents

meetings.name: CI Health & Merge Readiness Triage
meetings.goal: Keep required checks green; burn down CI failures

meetings.name: PR Merge Board Review (Oldest-First)
meetings.goal: Maximize merge throughput without breaking gates

meetings.name: GA Evidence & Governance Gate Review
meetings.goal: Evidence completeness, governance integrity, determinism

meetings.name: Release Captain Checkpoint
meetings.goal: Candidate selection, go/no-go, merge train, cut plan

meetings.name: Security Posture & Supply-Chain Integrity Standup
meetings.goal: Vulnerabilities, SBOM/provenance, policy violations

meetings.name: Architecture & Design Review Board
meetings.goal: Durable decisions, interface contracts, risk-managed change

meetings.name: Roadmap / Backlog Grooming & Scoring
meetings.goal: Keep Next saturated with executable, scored work

meetings.name: Operational Readiness Review (ORR)
meetings.goal: SLOs, runbooks, alerting, deploy verification, DR readiness

meetings.name: Demo / Narrative Readiness Sync
meetings.goal: Demo reliability, seeded states, fallback package

meetings.name: Retrospective & Process Improvement
meetings.goal: Convert failure modes into durable improvements

meetings.name: Compliance & Audit Pack Review
meetings.goal: Control coverage, evidence freshness, exceptions lifecycle

meetings.name: Incident Review & Postmortem Triage
meetings.goal: Root causes, corrective actions, prevention gates

meetings.name: Performance, Reliability, and Cost Review (FinOps)
meetings.goal: Budgets, regressions, hotspots, cost controls

meetings.name: Documentation & Knowledge Base Hygiene Review
meetings.goal: Reduce drift, broken links, policy violations

meetings.name: Customer Signal & Feedback Triage
meetings.goal: Convert feedback into prioritized, testable work

meetings.name: Data Quality, Provenance, and Graph Integrity Review
meetings.goal: Correctness, provenance, ER stability, integrity tests

meetings.name: Access, Permissions, and Secrets Governance Review
meetings.goal: Least privilege, secrets hygiene, CI token posture

meetings.name: Integrations & Partner Reliability Review
meetings.goal: Contract stability, resilience, deterministic test strategy

meetings.name: Test Strategy, Coverage, and Flake Governance Review
meetings.goal: Flake burn-down, hang mitigation, risk-based coverage

meetings.name: Privacy, Data Retention, and Deletion Lifecycle Review
meetings.goal: Retention/deletion policy, verification, no-PII artifacts

meetings.name: UX Consistency & Design System Review
meetings.goal: Prevent UI drift; accessibility; flow reliability

meetings.name: Developer Experience, Tooling, and Workflow Review
meetings.goal: Reduce setup friction; CI/local parity; tooling guardrails

meetings.name: Dependency Lifecycle, Upgrade, and Deprecation Review
meetings.goal: Predictable upgrades, lockfile integrity, policy checks

agent_role_mapping.Jules: Coordinator/PM execution; triage; roadmap; docs; demos; retros; DX; testing governance
agent_role_mapping.Atlas: Release captain; required checks; merge sequencing; cut/go-no-go
agent_role_mapping.Antigravity: Governance/evidence; compliance; supply-chain integrity; access/secrets; privacy; dependency policy
agent_role_mapping.Claude Code: Architecture; contracts; perf/cost; data/provenance; integration reliability; risk-managed refactors
agent_role_mapping.Codex CLI: Deterministic implementation of work orders into PR-ready diffs
agent_role_mapping.Qwen: Replay/cache-only analysis; never introduces nondeterminism on critical path
